sent.orig: To pressurize the air a supercharger must spin rapidly -- more rapidly than the engine itself.
sent.trans: 为了要压缩空气，机械增压机的叶片必须快速地旋转——甚至要比引擎本身转得还要快。

sent.orig: Tolerance builds up rapidly after a few doses and disappears rapidly after of days of abstinence.
sent.trans: 耐受性会在几次飞行后迅速建立，但是停飞几天后又会迅速消失。

sent.orig: Recently, Chinese mobile communicate career is developing rapidly and network capacity is increasing rapidly.
sent.trans: 近年来，我国的移动通信事业发展迅猛，网络容量快速增加。

sent.orig: He ascended rapidly-much more rapidly than he anticipated and rose above San Pedro.
sent.trans: 气球上升得很快——比他预想的快多了——升到了圣佩德罗上空。

sent.orig: The market rout is rapidly out amounts of wealth, casting a pall over households and businesses.
sent.trans: 股市重挫正迅速将大量财富席卷一空，给家庭和企业蒙上阴影。
